content.html: I think by gender would be better instead of by genitals. Like, it'd be really uncomfy for ciswomen and transmen, and cismen and transwomen to be in those spaces together. Could also be really outing, and dysphoric.
content.value:
I think by gender would be better instead of by genitals. 

Like, it'd be really uncomfy for ciswomen and transmen, and cismen and transwomen to be in those spaces together. Could also be really outing, and dysphoric.
